original_text: But look! The person who will give me to the rulers is sitting at the table with me. He is eating the same food as I am.
korean_text: 그러나 보라 나를 파는 자의 손이 나와 함께 상 위에 있도다

sentences.original_text: The person who will give me to the rulers
is sitting at the table with me.
He is eating the same food as I am.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나와 똑같은 음식을 먹고 있다.
